Module com.example.filemanager
Package com.example.filemanager

Class UIUtil

java.lang.Object
com.example.filemanager.UIUtil
public class UIUtil extends Object
A util class which mostly contains static functions that help create javafx constructs, i.e. it focuses on UI rather than logic.

  • Method Details

    • createNewTab

      public static void createNewTab​(javafx.scene.control.TabPane tabPane, LinkedList<LogicalTab> tabs, File file)
      Creates a new tab with open directory `file` and adds it into the tabPane. Also creates the corresponding Logical tab and adds it into the `tabs` list.
      Parameters:
      tabPane - the tabPane holding the newly created tab
      file - directory open in given tab

    • createAlert

      public static javafx.scene.control.Alert createAlert​(javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType type, String header, String body)
      Creates an Alert of given type with given message.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of alert
      header - the header text
      body - the `text` text
      Returns:
      the new alert

    • tryMovingToDirectory

      public static void tryMovingToDirectory​(File directory)
      Either moves current directory in UIController to provided directory or shows Alert.
      Parameters:
      directory - the directory to move to in the current tab.
